Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
I need help checking my ride status.  Can you help?
id?
Could you provide your booking ID, please?
I think it is 786.  And I hope John is not my driver!
name?
May I have your name, please?
Sorry. My name is Alexis.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]
Your driver is arriving
4 minutes
Your ride will be there in 4 minutes.
Your ride will be there in 4 minutes.
Did you find out who my driver is?  I really hope it's not John!!!
It's not John.
It's not John. I checked.
Oh thank goodness - he's a creepy dude!  I hope you never have to get a ride from him.!
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics. [instruction 3 of 6]
I will make a note of that. Is there anything else I can help you with?
I will make a note of that. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Yes, can I get some walking directions?  I'd be going from University to 5th and Main
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.) [instruction 4 of 6]
What time are you departing?
When are you going to start your trip?
Probably sometime tomorrow, I don't have a specific time.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given. [instruction 5 of 6]

Ok, then what?

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 6 of 6]

Ok thank you, that seems easy enough.  Can you also schedule a meeting for me - for Monday at 3pm with whoever is available.

Events.Text: Fantastic, your meeting with Fred has been successfully scheduled for Monday, 3 am-5 pm.

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Alexis

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 786)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'University' to '5th and Main') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. New York City or Pittsburgh)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
